entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Define libc targeting plan #69361
  • UdpClient GC pressure #69355
  • [API Proposal]: Make Unsafe work with readonly byref values #69352
  • Interop\StringMarshalling\UTF8\UTF8Test failing in outerloop #69349
    7.0.0
  • Bogus context name in InvalidCastException message #69341

Closed

  • HEAP CORRUPTION DETECTED in mscordaccore.dll #69353
    7.0.0
  • ARM32: Assertion failed 'varDsc->lvType == TYP_STRUCT' in 'System.SpanHelpers:Fill(byref,int,System.__Canon)' during 'Generate code' in jitminopts runs #69350
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\General\\NotSupported\\NotSupported_r\\NotSupported_r.cmd #69232
  • [Mono][WASM][Interp] 0 DLinkNodes finalized #56804
    7.0.0
  • How do I export a function with a Callback argument for use in c? NativeAOT #69328
  • Test failure JIT\\Stress\\ABI\\tailcalls_do\\tailcalls_do.cmd #69090
    7.0.0
  • ICorDebugThread::GetObject returns an ICorDebugReferenceValue object that's null #50953
    7.0.0
  • Add version.txt file to CoreCLR packages #7243
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix UTF8 string marshalling regression #69360
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Restore FP pairs when unwinding in ARM64 #69359
    Servicing-consider
  • [QUIC] Fixed work with QUIC_BUFFER #69351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add correct assembly context name to InvalidCastException message #69346
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • UOH alloc fix for hardlimit #69345
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #69343
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix debug proxy when used with blazor #69342
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Run host tests with dotnet test and enable crash/hang dumps #69340
    area-Host
  • Fix ASAN violation under Samsung's netcoredbg #69339
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Merged

  • Improve some use of Regex #68961
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix buffer overrun in dbgutil #69358
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1771311 #69337
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete a few unused definitions from coreclr pal #69357
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete incorrect asserts #69354
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not fold mismatched `OBJ(ADDR(LCL_VAR))` #69271
  • [mono][llvm] More LLVM 14.x changes. #69239
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Use more specific types in Interop.WideCharToMultiByte signature #69338
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Avoid unnecessary or duplicate PackageReferences - 7.0 Preview4 SDK work #69260
  • Ensure non-numeric types don't implement the numeric only generic math interfaces #69331
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add windows runtime packs as a workload #68981
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix missing metadata for ThreadPool Event #68876
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] JIT: fix scalability issue in redundant branch optimizer #68972
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • [mono] Fix parsing the 'nunbox-arbitrary-trampolines' aot argument. #69319
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono

Updated

  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink loop with stackalloc #69335
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add more char.Is* helpers for common ASCII sets #69318
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Address some System.Formats.Tar TODOs (infra and syscalls) #69107
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Use intrinsic for genLog2() #69333
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement constant-folding for `VNF_BitCast` #68979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • GetTotalPauseDuration implementation #68835
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Wasm conditional audit #69283
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow the inliner to substitute for small arguments #69068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Stream ReadAtLeast and ReadExactly #69272
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Arm64: Make unroll code for cpblk non-interruptible #69202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove most usages of *wprintf* family of functions #68237
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Make json source generation cancellable #69332
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm] First attempt at a wasm app host #68696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Adding Int128 and UInt128 with a base software implementation #69204
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize string.EndsWith(char) for const values #69038
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Prevent debugger deadlock with code versioning logic #68367
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `-p:NativeLib=Shared` to be implied in the absence of NativeLib #25431
  • Iconize executable #25424

Closed

  • .NET CLI: Allow to specify multiple packages at once `dotnet add package <package1> <package2> <package3> ..` #25396
  • SDK tests end up modifying the SDK manifests #24923

PullRequests

Created

  • Set the Framework and Runtime options as required for 'dotnet store' #25435
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #25434
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove transitive dependencies for System.Private.Uri #25419
    Area-Workloads
  • Remove transitive dependencies for System.Private.Uri #25420
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25409
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal] Allow overriding single accessor properties with multiple accessors #1568

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add `SourceText.From(StringBuilder)` API #61326
  • Improve `ru` localization for IDE0059 codefix #61325
  • Improve `ru` localization for IDE0040 #61324
  • Enable execution of test scenarios with implementation of static members in derived interfaces once runtime can handle it. #61321
  • Quick Info shows "Types:" section even when it's empty #61320

Closed

  • Test plan for "top-level statements" feature #43563
    17.3
  • Parameter null checking only included in IOperation when body is bound #58320
    17.3
  • Support converting more ?? expressions to parameter null checks #58699
    17.3
  • Address param-nullchecking formatting issues #58950
    Backlog
  • Adjust generic null-checking codegen for clarity #59223
    17.3
  • nullchecking fixer should remove '_ = var ?? throw;' statements #59532
    17.3
  • Parameter null checking incorrectly handled in arglist operations #58322
    17.3
  • Additional PROTOTYPE comments for param-nullchecking #58335
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge 'main' into DefaultInterfaceImplementation #61323
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove PROTOTYPE comments #61322
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces

Merged

  • [EE] Implement IDkmClrFullNameProvider2 in Roslyn's ResultProvider Formatter. #60522
    Area-Interactive, Community, Next
  • Remove parameter null-checking from the Language Feature Status list #61302
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next
  • Add pointer for `AnalysisLevel` to warning waves doc #61196
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61319
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61318
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #61331
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61330
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61329
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #61328
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #61327
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow creating SourceText from a StringBuilder #61251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Parse `unchecked` gracefully in operators #61309
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not try to do a smart copy/paste when the paste change is not fully within the string. #61317
    Area-IDE
  • Improve command-line parsing for linux #60711
    Area-Compilers
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Test the EditorFeatures layer on net472 and net6.0-windows #61234
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ModelState validation changes when adding a new property to an existing model #41687
  • [Minimal API] Validation errors are absent in response #41686
  • Advanced component Blazor #41684

Closed

  • TraceIdentifier performance is inconsistent #41651
  • Clarification on AuthenticateResult.NoResult vs AuthenticateResult.Failure. 2nd iteration. #40645
    Discussions
  • HTTP OPTIONS verb #41659
  • [SignalR] Add HttpClientHandler change support #41685
  • Kestrel should merge HTTP/2 request Cookie headers #26461
    7.0-preview5

PullRequests

Merged

  • Avoid repeatedly encoding method name strings in protocol #41644
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview5
  • Merge HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 request cookies on Kestrel #41591
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add trimming annotations to DotNetObjectReference #41610
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-jsinterop
  • Improve gRPC JSON transcoding request binding and support HttpBody #41523
    area-grpc
  • Update duende versions to 6.0.4 #41370
    area-infrastructure
  • Enable trim analyzer #41683
    area-infrastructure
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.6
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Starting the debugger with WiFi and Mobile Data turned off crashes #7189
  • MAUI Windows Machine Developer Mode #7187
  • Scrollview stops working with a margin set on 1st element #7186
  • Suggest alternative actions when MAUI Templates are not installed with VS 2022 Preview 6.0 #7185
  • Search Handler visual and functional bug in subtabs #7184

Closed

  • Resizetizer doesn't keep color from SVG #7101
    6.0.300
  • SVG images with inner styles shows are incorrect #7129
  • net maui for linux desktop #7188
  • RC3 iOS AppCenter Dependency on System.Windows.Forms 4.0.0 crashes App #7175
  • Label content alignment is not proper when it has span elements. #7131
  • Label FormattedText causes text miss-alignment and clipping #6585
    6.0.300-servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow AbsoluteLayout children to auto size when height/width are not proportional #7183

Merged

  • Ensure CSS can be used in SVG files #7106
    area/single project ☝️, 6.0.300

Updated

  • Add User-Agent when downloading image streams #5985
    t/bug, area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge, .NET 7
  • [X] simpilfy and avoid duplication in conversion #7143
    area/perf 🏎️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nesting `DbContext` scopes breaks filtering semantics on queries on the outer context #28025
  • DatabaseGeneratedOption.Identity not working on Guid property #28024

PullRequests

Merged

  • Query: Add interface to get ITableBase for root level table sources #28020

Updated

  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
  • Query: Translate GetType == type on hierarchy #28011
